Package tw.jruletest.files.source

Class SourceClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • tw.jruletest.files.source.SourceClass
  • public class SourceClass
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class to store details of a source class and provide methods of analysis

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      SourceClass​(java.lang.String className)
      SourceClass constructor uses the represented class's name to find the class, collects the fields and methods and stores them in their respective objects.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String getClassName()
      Returns the base class name for the represented class
      java.lang.String getFullClassName()
      Returns the class name for the represented class, including the packages
      SourceMember getMember​(java.lang.String memberName)
      Finds the method or field defined by the required method or field memberName.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • SourceClass

        public SourceClass​(java.lang.String className)
            throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        SourceClass constructor uses the represented class's name to find the class, collects the fields and methods and stores them in their respective objects.
        Parameters:
        className - the name of the class to be represented by this object
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - when the class with the provided class name either doesn't exist or hss not been loaded into the classpath.

    • Method Detail

      • getMember

        public SourceMember getMember​(java.lang.String memberName)
                       throws UnidentifiedCallException,
                              AmbiguousMemberException
        Finds the method or field defined by the required method or field memberName.
        Parameters:
        memberName - the name of the member to find
        Returns:
        the member found with the provided name
        Throws:
        UnidentifiedCallException - thrown when theis object does not have a field or method defined by the provided member name
        AmbiguousMemberException - thrown when there is more than one occurrence of members with the provided name

      • getClassName

        public java.lang.String getClassName()
        Returns the base class name for the represented class
        Returns:
        the name of the class represented by this object

      • getFullClassName

        public java.lang.String getFullClassName()
        Returns the class name for the represented class, including the packages
        Returns:
        the full name of the class represented by this object
